external_games.name: Cthulhu Mythos ADV The Isle Of Ubohoth

name: Cthulhu Mythos ADV The Isle Of Ubohoth
storyline: On a mysterious island in the Seto Inland Sea, an urban legend tells that completing the "88 Temples Pilgrimage" will summon Kukai, who will grant your wish. Our protagonist, visiting this island, is suddenly cursed by an unknown entity, putting their life in jeopardy. Can they prevent the resurrection of an ancient evil god sealed on the island and break the curse?
summary: A horror dice roll adventure inspired by the Cthulhu Mythos. Much like in a tabletop RPG, "abilities," "luck," and "dice rolls" influence the story's progression. The protagonist is cursed on an island in the Seto Inland Sea. Investigate the island, uncover the mysteries, and break the curse!
